entry.title: [GRA1][Web Hosting] - Cluster021 Incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 16, 19:07 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Web Hosting offer on the specific Cluster021.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 16/09/2025 13:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Manager may have some malfunctions in Cluster021
Customers Impact : Customers may face some slowness creating a Domain on Cluster021
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 16, 19:00 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Hosting offer in the specific Cluster021.

Start time : 16/09/2025 13:00 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
